data.eml:eml: Two new species of sand-burrowing amphipods of the genus Haustorius Müller, 1775 (Amphipoda: Haustoriidae) from the northwestern Gulf of Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hancock, Zachary B., Wicksten, Mary K. (2018): Two new species of sand-burrowing amphipods of the genus Haustorius Müller, 1775 (Amphipoda: Haustoriidae) from the northwestern Gulf of Mexico. Zootaxa 4459 (1): 101-127, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4459.1.4
